# correlate-AnyHermesData ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' Correlation between Sample Counts of `AnyHermesData`

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' The `correlate()` method can calculate the correlation matrix between the sample vectors of

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' counts from a specified assay. This produces a [`HermesDataCor`] object, which is an extension

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' of a [`matrix`] with additional quality flags in the slot `flag_data`

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' (containing the `tech_failure_flag` and `low_depth_flag` columns describing the original

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' input samples).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' An `autoplot()` method then afterwards can produce the corresponding heatmap.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname calc_cor

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases calc_cor

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr object to calculate the correlation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assay_name (`string`)\cr the name of the assay to use.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param method (`string`)\cr the correlation method, see [stats::cor()] for details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A [`HermesDataCor`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' # Calculate the sample correlation matrix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' correlate(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can specify another correlation coefficient to be calculated.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- correlate(object, method = "spearman")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  f = "correlate",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "AnyHermesData",

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
                        assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
                        method = "pearson",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
                        ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    8x
                    
                      
    assert_that(is.string(assay_name))

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    7x
                    
                      
    chosen_assay <- assay(object, assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    7x
                    
                      
    sample_cor_matrix <- stats::cor(chosen_assay, method = method)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    6x
                    
                      
    .HermesDataCor(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    6x
                    
                      
      sample_cor_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    6x
                    
                      
      flag_data = colData(object)[, c("tech_failure_flag", "low_depth_flag")]

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
# HermesDataCor ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname calc_cor

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases HermesDataCor

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @exportClass HermesDataCor

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
.HermesDataCor <- setClass( # nolint

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  Class = "HermesDataCor",

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "matrix",

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(flag_data = "DataFrame")

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
)

# autoplot-HermesDataCor ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn calc_cor This `autoplot()` method uses the [ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap()] function

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'   to plot the correlations between samples saved in a [`HermesDataCor`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @param flag_colors (named `character`)\cr a vector that specifies the colors for `TRUE` and `FALSE`

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'   flag values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cor_colors (`function`)\cr color scale function for the correlation values in the heatmap,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'   produced by [circlize::colorRamp2()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... other arguments to be passed to [ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' # Plot the correlation matrix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can customize the heatmap.

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result, show_column_names = FALSE, show_row_names = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' # Including changing the axis label text size.

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'   result,

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'   row_names_gp = grid::gpar(fontsize = 8),

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'   column_names_gp = grid::gpar(fontsize = 8)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  f = "autoplot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c(object = "HermesDataCor"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
                        flag_colors = c("FALSE" = "green", "TRUE" = "red"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
                        cor_colors = circlize::colorRamp2(c(0, 0.5, 1), c("red", "yellow", "green")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
                        ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    3x
                    
                      
    df <- object@flag_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    3x
                    
                      
    left_annotation <- ComplexHeatmap::rowAnnotation(

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    3x
                    
                      
      "Low Depth" = factor(df$low_depth_flag),

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    3x
                    
                      
      col = list("Low Depth" = flag_colors)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    3x
                    
                      
    top_annotation <- ComplexHeatmap::HeatmapAnnotation(

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    3x
                    
                      
      "Technical Failure" = factor(df$tech_failure_flag),

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    3x
                    
                      
      col = list("Technical Failure" = flag_colors)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    3x
                    
                      
    mat <- as(object, "matrix")

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    3x
                    
                      
    ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    3x
                    
                      
      matrix = mat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    3x
                    
                      
      col = cor_colors,

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    3x
                    
                      
      name = "Correlation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    3x
                    
                      
      left_annotation = left_annotation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    3x
                    
                      
      top_annotation = top_annotation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
      ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Creation of Unique Labels

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function generates a set of unique labels given

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' unique IDs and not necessarily unique names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ids (`character` or `NULL`)\cr unique IDs.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param nms (`character` or `NULL`)\cr not necessarily unique names if provided.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character vector where empty names are replaced by the IDs and

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   non-unique names are made unique by appending the IDs in parentheses.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' h_unique_labels(c("1", "2", "3"), c("A", "B", "A"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' h_unique_labels(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' h_unique_labels(c("1", "2", "3"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
h_unique_labels <- function(ids, nms = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    47x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(ids)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    5x
                    
                      
    return(NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    42x
                    
                      
  assert_character(ids, any.missing = FALSE, unique = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    42x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(nms)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    15x
                    
                      
    return(ids)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    27x
                    
                      
  assert_character(nms, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    27x
                    
                      
  assert_true(identical(length(ids), length(nms)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    27x
                    
                      
  res <- ifelse(nms == "", ids, nms)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    27x
                    
                      
  are_duplicate <- h_all_duplicated(res)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    27x
                    
                      
  if (any(are_duplicate)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    8x
                    
                      
    res[are_duplicate] <- paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    8x
                    
                      
      res[are_duplicate],

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    8x
                    
                      
      h_parens(ids[are_duplicate])

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    27x
                    
                      
  assert_character(res, any.missing = FALSE, unique = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    27x
                    
                      
  res

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' R6 Class Representing a Gene (Signature) Specification

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' A `GeneSpec` consists of the gene IDs (possibly named with labels),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' the summary function and the name of the summary function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' # Minimal specification if only one gene is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec <- gene_spec("GeneID:1820")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' # Using multiple genes with a signature.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec <- gene_spec(c("GeneID:1820", "GeneID:52"), fun = colMeans)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec <- gene_spec(c("GeneID:1820", "GeneID:52"), fun = colPrinComp1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$returns_vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$get_genes()

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$get_gene_labels()

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$get_label()

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' # Using multiple genes with partial labels, without a signature.

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec <- gene_spec(c(A = "GeneID:1820", "GeneID:52"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$returns_vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$get_gene_labels()

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' # Use the gene specification to extract genes from a matrix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'   data = rpois(15, 10),

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   nrow = 3, ncol = 5,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(c("GeneID:1820", "GeneID:52", "GeneID:523"), NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$extract(mat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can also extract these as a `data.frame`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' x_spec$extract_data_frame(mat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
GeneSpec <- R6::R6Class(

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  "GeneSpec",

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  public = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Creates a new [`GeneSpec`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param genes (named `character` or `NULL`)\cr the gene IDs, where the names

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
    #'   are used as labels if available.

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param fun (`function` or `NULL`)\cr summary function. If `NULL` is

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
    #'   used then multiple genes are not summarized but returned as a matrix from the

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
    #'   `extract` method.

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param fun_name (`string`)\cr name of the summary function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return A new [`GeneSpec`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    initialize = function(genes = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
                          fun = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
                          fun_name = deparse(substitute(fun))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    41x
                    
                      
      assert_character(genes, any.missing = FALSE, unique = TRUE, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    41x
                    
                      
      assert_function(fun, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    41x
                    
                      
      assert_string(fun_name, min.chars = 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    41x
                    
                      
      private$gene_labels <- h_unique_labels(ids = genes, nms = names(genes))

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    41x
                    
                      
      private$genes <- genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    41x
                    
                      
      private$fun <- fun

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    41x
                    
                      
      private$fun_name <- fun_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Returns the genes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    get_genes = function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    29x
                    
                      
      private$genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Returns the gene labels (substituted by gene IDs if not available).

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param genes (`character`)\cr for which subset of genes the labels should be returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    get_gene_labels = function(genes = self$get_genes()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    26x
                    
                      
      index <- match(genes, private$genes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    26x
                    
                      
      assert_integer(index, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    25x
                    
                      
      private$gene_labels[index]

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Predicate whether the extract returns a vector or not.

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
    returns_vector = function() {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    41x
                    
                      
      (length(private$genes) == 1) || is.function(private$fun)

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Returns a string which can be used e.g. for plot labels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param genes (`character`)\cr for which subset of genes the labels should be returned.

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
    get_label = function(genes = self$get_genes()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    14x
                    
                      
      gene_labels <- self$get_gene_labels(genes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    14x
                    
                      
      if (length(private$genes) > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    6x
                    
                      
        gene_list <- h_parens(h_short_list(gene_labels))

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    6x
                    
                      
        if (self$returns_vector()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    4x
                    
                      
          paste0(private$fun_name, gene_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    2x
                    
                      
          gene_list

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    8x
                    
                      
        private$gene_labels

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Extract the gene values from an assay as specified.

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param assay (`matrix`)\cr original matrix with rownames containing the

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
    #'   specified genes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return Either a vector with one value per column, or a matrix with multiple

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    #'   genes in the rows.

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    extract = function(assay) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    27x
                    
                      
      assert_class(assay, "matrix")

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    25x
                    
                      
      assert_names(rownames(assay), must.include = private$genes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    23x
                    
                      
      assay_cols <- assay[private$genes, , drop = FALSE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    23x
                    
                      
      if (self$returns_vector()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    13x
                    
                      
        res <- if (is.function(private$fun)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    7x
                    
                      
          private$fun(assay_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    6x
                    
                      
          as.vector(assay_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    13x
                    
                      
        assert_numeric(res, len = ncol(assay_cols))

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    13x
                    
                      
        stats::setNames(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    13x
                    
                      
          res,

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    13x
                    
                      
          colnames(assay)

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    10x
                    
                      
        rownames(assay_cols) <- private$gene_labels

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    10x
                    
                      
        assay_cols

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
    #' @description Extract the gene values as a `data.frame`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
    #' @param assay (`matrix`)\cr original matrix with rownames containing the

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
    #'   specified genes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
    #' @return A `data.frame` with the genes in the columns and the samples

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
    #'   in the rows.

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
    extract_data_frame = function(assay) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    12x
                    
                      
      gene_matrix <- self$extract(assay)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    10x
                    
                      
      if (!is.matrix(gene_matrix)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    5x
                    
                      
        gene_matrix <- t(gene_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    10x
                    
                      
      num_genes <- nrow(gene_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    10x
                    
                      
      gene_names <- if (num_genes == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    5x
                    
                      
        self$get_label()

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    5x
                    
                      
        self$get_gene_labels()

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    10x
                    
                      
      gene_names <- make.names(gene_names, unique = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    10x
                    
                      
      rownames(gene_matrix) <- gene_names

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    10x
                    
                      
      data.frame(t(gene_matrix))

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  private = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
    genes = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
    gene_labels = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
    fun = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
    fun_name = NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#' `GeneSpec` Constructor

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' Creates a new [`GeneSpec`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' @param genes (named `character` or `NULL`)\cr the gene IDs, where the names

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#'   are used as labels if available.

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fun (`function` or `NULL`)\cr summary function. If `NULL` is

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#'   used then multiple genes are not summarized but returned as a matrix from the

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#'   `extract` method.

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fun_name (`string`)\cr name of the summary function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A new [`GeneSpec`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' gene_spec("GeneID:11185")

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#' gene_spec(c("GeneID:11185", "GeneID:10677", "GeneID:101928428"), fun = colMeans)

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
gene_spec <- function(genes = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
                      fun = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
                      fun_name = deparse(substitute(fun))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    9x
                    
                      
  GeneSpec$new(

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    9x
                    
                      
    genes = genes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    9x
                    
                      
    fun = fun,

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    9x
                    
                      
    fun_name = fun_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Histogram of Library Sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This creates a histogram of the library sizes of the [AnyHermesData] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param bins (`count`)\cr number of evenly distributed groups desired.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fill (`string`)\cr color of the bars filling.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ggplot` object with the histogram.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_libsize_hist(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_libsize_hist(result, bins = 10L, fill = "blue")

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
draw_libsize_hist <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
                              bins = 30L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
                              fill = "darkgrey") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    3x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    3x
                    
                      
    is.count(bins),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    3x
                    
                      
    is.string(fill)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    3x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(libsize = colSums(counts(object)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    3x
                    
                      
  ggplot(df, aes(x = .data$libsize)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    3x
                    
                      
    geom_histogram(bins = bins, fill = fill) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    3x
                    
                      
    stat_bin(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    3x
                    
                      
      bins = bins,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    3x
                    
                      
      geom = "text",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    3x
                    
                      
      aes(label = ifelse(after_stat(.data$count) > 0, after_stat(.data$count), "")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    3x
                    
                      
      vjust = -0.25

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    ) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    3x
                    
                      
    ggtitle("Histogram of Library Sizes") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    3x
                    
                      
    xlab("Library Size") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    3x
                    
                      
    ylab("Frequency")

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' Q-Q Plot of Library Sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' This creates a Q-Q plot of the library sizes of the [AnyHermesData] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @param color (`string`)\cr color of Q-Q line.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @param linetype (`string`)\cr line type of  Q-Q line.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ggplot` object with the Q-Q Plot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_libsize_qq(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_libsize_qq(result, color = "blue", linetype = "solid")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can also add sample names as labels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' library(ggrepel)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_libsize_qq(result) + geom_text_repel(label = colnames(result), stat = "qq")

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
draw_libsize_qq <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
                            color = "grey",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
                            linetype = "dashed") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    3x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    3x
                    
                      
    is.string(color),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    3x
                    
                      
    is.string(linetype)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    3x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(libsize = colSums(counts(object)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    3x
                    
                      
  ggplot(df, aes(sample = .data$libsize)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    3x
                    
                      
    stat_qq() +

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    3x
                    
                      
    stat_qq_line(color = color, linetype = linetype) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    3x
                    
                      
    theme_classic() +

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    3x
                    
                      
    ggtitle("Q-Q Plot of Library Sizes") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    3x
                    
                      
    xlab("Theoretical Quantiles") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    3x
                    
                      
    ylab("Sample Quantiles") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    3x
                    
                      
    theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold")) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    3x
                    
                      
    theme(axis.text.y = element_text(angle = 90))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' Density Plot of (Log) Counts Distributions

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' This creates a density plot of the (log) counts distributions of the [AnyHermesData] object where each line

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' on the plot corresponds to a sample.

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @param log (`flag`)\cr should the counts be log transformed (log2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ggplot` object with the density plot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_libsize_densities(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_libsize_densities(result, log = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
draw_libsize_densities <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
                                   log = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    3x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    3x
                    
                      
    is.flag(log)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    3x
                    
                      
  counts <- as.data.frame(counts(object))

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    3x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(log)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    3x
                    
                      
    df <- log2(counts + 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    3x
