    title <- "Log2 Count Distribution"

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    3x
                    
                      
    xlab <- "Log2(Count + 1)"

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    df <- counts

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    !
                    
                      
    title <- "Count Distribution"

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
    xlab <- "Counts"

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    3x
                    
                      
  df_long <- tidyr::gather(df, key = "Sample", value = "Counts")

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    3x
                    
                      
  ggplot(df_long, aes(.data$Counts, group = .data$Sample)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    3x
                    
                      
    geom_density() +

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    3x
                    
                      
    expand_limits(x = -2.5) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    3x
                    
                      
    ggtitle(title) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    3x
                    
                      
    xlab(xlab) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    3x
                    
                      
    ylab("Density")

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' Boxplot of Non-Zero Genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' This draws a boxplot, with overlaid data points, of the number of

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' non-zero expressed genes per sample.

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @param position (`Position`)\cr specifies x-axis position of points, e.g. for jittering.

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' @param alpha (`proportion`)\cr specifies transparency of points.

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ggplot` object with the boxplot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#' # Default boxplot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_nonzero_boxplot(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' # Reusing the same position for labeling.

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' library(ggrepel)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' pos <- position_jitter(0.5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_nonzero_boxplot(result, position = pos) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'   geom_text_repel(aes(label = samples(result)), position = pos)

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
draw_nonzero_boxplot <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
                                 position = position_jitter(0.2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
                                 alpha = 0.25) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    4x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    4x
                    
                      
    is_class(position, "Position")

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    4x
                    
                      
  expect_proportion(alpha)

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    4x
                    
                      
  no_na_count <- colSums(counts(object) != 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    4x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(no_na = no_na_count, x = "Sample")

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    4x
                    
                      
  ggplot(df, aes(y = .data$no_na, x = .data$x)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    4x
                    
                      
    geom_boxplot(outlier.shape = NA) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    4x
                    
                      
    stat_boxplot(geom = "errorbar") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    4x
                    
                      
    geom_point(

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    4x
                    
                      
      position = position,

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    4x
                    
                      
      alpha = alpha

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
    ) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    4x
                    
                      
    EnvStats::stat_n_text(text.box = TRUE) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggtitle("Distribution of non-zero expressed genes") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    4x
                    
                      
    xlab("Library") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    4x
                    
                      
    ylab("Number of non-zero genes")

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' Stacked Barplot of Low Expression Genes by Chromosome

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#' This creates a barplot of chromosomes for the [AnyHermesData] object with the proportions of low expression genes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' @param chromosomes (`character`)\cr names of the chromosomes which should be displayed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' @param include_others (`flag`)\cr option to show the chromosomes not in `chromosomes` as "Others".

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ggplot` object with the histogram.

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' # Display chromosomes 1-22, X, Y, and MT. Other chromosomes are displayed in "Others".

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#' # To increase readability, we can have flip the coordinate axes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_genes_barplot(object) + coord_flip()

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' # Alternatively we can also rotate the x-axis tick labels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_genes_barplot(object) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' # Display chromosomes 1 and 2. Other chromosomes are displayed in "Others".

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_genes_barplot(object, chromosomes = c("1", "2"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
#' # Display chromosomes 1 and 2 only.

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_genes_barplot(object, chromosomes = c("1", "2"), include_others = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
draw_genes_barplot <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
                               chromosomes = c(seq_len(22), "X", "Y", "MT"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
                               include_others = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    4x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    4x
                    
                      
    noNA(rowData(object)$low_expression_flag),

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    4x
                    
                      
    is.flag(include_others),

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    4x
                    
                      
    !any(duplicated(chromosomes)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    4x
                    
                      
    !("Others" %in% chromosomes)

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    4x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    4x
                    
                      
    chromosome = rowData(object)$chromosome,

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    4x
                    
                      
    low_expression_flag = rowData(object)$low_expression_flag,

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    4x
                    
                      
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    4x
                    
                      
  df$chr <- factor(

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    4x
                    
                      
    ifelse(df$chromosome %in% chromosomes, df$chromosome, "Others"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    4x
                    
                      
    levels = c(chromosomes, "Others")

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!include_others) df <- df[df$chr != "Others", ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    4x
                    
                      
  ggplot(data = df, aes(x = .data$chr)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    4x
                    
                      
    geom_bar(aes(fill = .data$low_expression_flag)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    4x
                    
                      
    ggtitle("Stacked Barplot of Filtered Genes by Chromosome") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    4x
                    
                      
    xlab("Chromosome") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    4x
                    
                      
    ylab("Number of Genes") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    4x
                    
                      
    labs(fill = "Low Expression")

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
# autoplot(AnyHermesData) ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#' All Standard Plots in Default Setting

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#' This generates all standard plots - histogram and q-q plot of library sizes, density plot of the (log) counts

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#' distributions, boxplot of the number of number of non-zero expressed genes per sample, and a stacked barplot of low

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#' expression genes by chromosome at default setting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot_all

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases plot_all

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A list with the `ggplot` objects from [draw_libsize_hist()], [draw_libsize_qq()],

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
#'   [draw_libsize_densities()], [draw_nonzero_boxplot()] and [draw_genes_barplot()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
#'   functions with default settings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
  f = "autoplot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c(object = "AnyHermesData"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    2x
                    
                      
    assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    2x
                    
                      
      is_hermes_data(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    2x
                    
                      
    result <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    2x
                    
                      
      libsize_hist = draw_libsize_hist(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    2x
                    
                      
      libsize_qq = draw_libsize_qq(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    2x
                    
                      
      libsize_densities = draw_libsize_densities(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    2x
                    
                      
      nonzero_boxplot = draw_nonzero_boxplot(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    2x
                    
                      
      genes_barplot = draw_genes_barplot(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    2x
                    
                      
    lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    2x
                    
                      
      X = result,

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    2x
                    
                      
      FUN = grid::grid.draw

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    2x
                    
                      
    invisible(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Control Settings for Counts Normalization

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This control function allows for easy customization of the normalization settings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param log (`flag`)\cr whether `log2` values are returned, otherwise original scale is used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lib_sizes (`NULL` or `counts`)\cr library sizes, if `NULL` the vector with the sum of the

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   counts for each of the samples will be used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param prior_count (non-negative `number`)\cr average count to be added to each observation to

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   avoid taking log of zero, used only when `log = TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fit_type (`string`)\cr method to estimate dispersion parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   in Negative Binomial model, used only when [normalize()] methods include `vst` and/or `rlog`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   See [`estimateDispersions`][DESeq2::estimateDispersions,DESeqDataSet-method()] for details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return List with the above settings used to perform the normalization procedure.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @note To be used with the [normalize()] function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' control_normalize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' control_normalize(log = FALSE, lib_sizes = rep(1e6L, 20))

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
control_normalize <- function(log = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                              lib_sizes = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                              prior_count = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
                              fit_type = "parametric") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    62x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    62x
                    
                      
    is.flag(log),

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    62x
                    
                      
    is.null(lib_sizes) || is_counts_vector(lib_sizes),

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    62x
                    
                      
    is.number(prior_count) && prior_count >= 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    62x
                    
                      
    is.string(fit_type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    57x
                    
                      
  list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    57x
                    
                      
    log = log,

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    57x
                    
                      
    lib_sizes = lib_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    57x
                    
                      
    prior_count = prior_count,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    57x
                    
                      
    fit_type = fit_type

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
# normalize ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' Normalization of `AnyHermesData` Objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' The `normalize()` method is normalizing the input [`AnyHermesData`] according to one or more

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' specified normalization methods. The results are saved as additional assays

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' in the object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' Possible normalization methods (which are implemented with separate helper functions):

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' - cpm: Counts per Million (`CPM`). Separately by sample, the original counts of the genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'   are divided by the library size of this sample, and multiplied by one million. This is the

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'   appropriate normalization for between-sample comparisons.

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' - rpkm: Reads per Kilobase of transcript per Million reads mapped (RPKM). Each gene count is

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   divided by the gene size (in kilobases) and then again divided by the library sizes of each

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   sample (in millions). This allows for within-sample comparisons, as it takes

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   into account the gene sizes - longer genes will always have more counts than shorter genes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' - tpm: Transcripts per Million (TPM). This addresses the problem of RPKM being inconsistent

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   across samples (which can be seen that the sum of all RPKM values will vary from sample to

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   sample). Therefore here we divide the RPKM by the sum of all RPKM values for each sample,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   and multiply by one million.

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' - voom: VOOM normalization. This is essentially just a slight variation of `CPM` where

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'   a `prior_count` of 0.5 is combined with `lib_sizes` increased by 1 for each sample. Note that

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'   this is not required for the corresponding differential expression analysis, but just provided

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'   as a complementary experimental normalization approach here.

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' - `vst`: Variance stabilizing transformation. This is to transform the normalized

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'    count data for all genes into approximately homoskedastic values (having constant variance).

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' - `rlog`: The transformation to the log2 scale values with approximately homoskedastic values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname normalize

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases normalize

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr object to normalize.

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @param methods (`character`)\cr which normalization methods to use, see details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' @param control (named `list`)\cr settings produced by [control_normalize()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... not used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The [`AnyHermesData`] object with additional assays containing the normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'   The `control` is saved in the `metadata` of the object for future reference.

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso [control_normalize()] to define the normalization method settings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom BiocGenerics normalize

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' a <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' # By default, log values are used with a prior count of 1 added to original counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- normalize(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' assayNames(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' tpm <- assay(result, "tpm")

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' tpm[1:3, 1:3]

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can also work on original scale.

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' result_orig <- normalize(a, control = control_normalize(log = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' tpm_orig <- assay(result_orig, "tpm")

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' tpm_orig[1:3, 1:3]

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  f = "normalize",

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "AnyHermesData",

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
                        methods = c("cpm", "rpkm", "tpm", "voom", "vst"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
                        control = control_normalize(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
                        ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    16x
                    
                      
    norm_funs <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    16x
                    
                      
      cpm = h_cpm,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    16x
                    
                      
      rpkm = h_rpkm,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    16x
                    
                      
      tpm = h_tpm,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    16x
                    
                      
      voom = h_voom,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    16x
                    
                      
      vst = h_vst,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    16x
                    
                      
      rlog = h_rlog

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    16x
                    
                      
    method_choices <- names(norm_funs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    16x
                    
                      
    assert_subset(x = methods, choices = method_choices)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    14x
                    
                      
    methods <- match.arg(methods, choices = method_choices, several.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    14x
                    
                      
    for (method in methods) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    59x
                    
                      
      fun <- norm_funs[[method]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    59x
                    
                      
      method_result <- fun(

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    59x
                    
                      
        object = object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    59x
                    
                      
        control = control

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    58x
                    
                      
      assay(object, method) <- method_result

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    13x
                    
                      
    metadata(object) <- c(metadata(object), list(control_normalize = control))

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    13x
                    
                      
    object

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn normalize calculates the Counts per Million (`CPM`) normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#' # Separate calculation of the CPM normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' counts_cpm <- h_cpm(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' str(counts_cpm)

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
h_cpm <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
                  control = control_normalize()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    19x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    19x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    19x
                    
                      
    is_list_with(control, c("lib_sizes", "log", "prior_count"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    15x
                    
                      
  edgeR::cpm(

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    15x
                    
                      
    y = counts(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    15x
                    
                      
    lib.size = control$lib_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    15x
                    
                      
    log = control$log,

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    15x
                    
                      
    prior.count = control$prior_count

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn normalize calculates the Reads per Kilobase per Million (RPKM) normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' # Separate calculation of the RPKM normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' counts_rpkm <- h_rpkm(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#' str(counts_rpkm)

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
h_rpkm <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
                   control = control_normalize()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    37x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    37x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    37x
                    
                      
    is_list_with(control, c("lib_sizes", "log", "prior_count")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    37x
                    
                      
    noNA(rowData(object)$size)

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    29x
                    
                      
  edgeR::rpkm(

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    29x
                    
                      
    y = counts(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    29x
                    
                      
    gene.length = rowData(object)$size,

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    29x
                    
                      
    lib.size = control$lib_sizes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    29x
                    
                      
    log = control$log,

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    29x
                    
                      
    prior.count = control$prior_count

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn normalize calculates the Transcripts per Million (TPM) normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#' # Separate calculation of the TPM normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#' counts_tpm <- h_tpm(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' str(counts_tpm)

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
h_tpm <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
                  control = control_normalize()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    18x
                    
                      
  rpkm <- h_rpkm(object, control_normalize(log = FALSE))

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    15x
                    
                      
  rpkm_sums <- colSums(rpkm, na.rm = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    15x
                    
                      
  tpm <- sweep(rpkm, MARGIN = 2, STATS = rpkm_sums, FUN = "/") * 1e6

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (control$log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    14x
                    
                      
    log2(tpm + control$prior_count)

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    !
                    
                      
    tpm

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn normalize calculates the VOOM normalized counts. `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' # Separate calculation of the VOOM normalized counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#' counts_voom <- h_voom(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' str(counts_voom)

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
h_voom <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
                   control = control_normalize()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    20x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    20x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    20x
                    
                      
    is_list_with(control, c("lib_sizes", "log"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    16x
                    
                      
  cnts <- counts(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    16x
                    
                      
  if (S4Vectors::isEmpty(cnts)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    2x
                    
                      
    return(cnts)

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    14x
                    
                      
  norm_log2 <- limma::voom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    14x
                    
                      
    counts = cnts,

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    14x
                    
                      
    lib.size = control$lib_sizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    14x
                    
                      
  )$E

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    14x
                    
                      
  if (control$log) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    14x
                    
                      
    norm_log2

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    !
                    
                      
    2^norm_log2

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn normalize variance stabilizing transformation (`vst`) from `DESeq2` package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
#' # Separate calculation of the vst transformation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
#' counts_vst <- h_vst(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#' str(counts_vst)

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
h_vst <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
                  control = control_normalize()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    19x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    19x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    19x
                    
                      
    is_list_with(control, "fit_type")

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    15x
                    
                      
  tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    15x
                    
                      
    expr = {

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    15x
                    
                      
      DESeq2::varianceStabilizingTransformation(

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    15x
                    
                      
        counts(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    15x
                    
                      
        fitType = control$fit_type

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
    },

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    15x
                    
                      
    error = function(e) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    4x
                    
                      
      stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    4x
                    
                      
        "Problem during calculation of variance-stabilized transformation (VST), ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    4x
                    
                      
        "try again with more genes. More details: ", e

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn normalize regularized log transformation (`rlog`) from `DESeq2` package.

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples
