                    364
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    !
                    
                      
    mart <- as(connection, "Mart")

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    !
                    
                      
    df <- h_get_annotation_biomart(gene_ids, id_var = id_var, mart = mart)

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    !
                    
                      
    with(

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    !
                    
                      
      df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    !
                    
                      
      S4Vectors::DataFrame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    
                    
                      
        # Required annotations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    !
                    
                      
        symbol = hgnc_symbol,

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    !
                    
                      
        desc = entrezgene_description,

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    !
                    
                      
        chromosome = as.character(chromosome_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    !
                    
                      
        size = size,

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    
                    
                      
        # Additional annotations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    !
                    
                      
        canonical_transcript = refseq_mrna,

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    !
                    
                      
        protein_transcript = refseq_peptide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      
        # Ensure correct row names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    !
                    
                      
        row.names = genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Scatterplot for Gene Expression Values

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This produces a scatterplot of two genes or gene signatures.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assay_name (`string`)\cr selects assay from input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x_spec (`GeneSpec`)\cr gene specification for the x-axis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param y_spec (`GeneSpec`)\cr gene specification for the y-axis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param color_var (`string` or `NULL`)\cr optional color variable, taken

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   from input sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param facet_var (`string` or `NULL`)\cr optional faceting variable, taken

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   from input sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param smooth_method (`string`)\cr smoothing method to use, either linear

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   regression line (`lm`), local polynomial regression (`loess`) or `none`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ggplot` scatterplot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' g <- genes(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_scatterplot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   facet_var = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   x_spec = gene_spec(c(A = g[1])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   y_spec = gene_spec(g[2]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   color = "RACE"

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' object2 <- object %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' g2 <- genes(object2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_scatterplot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   object2,

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay_name = "tpm",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   facet_var = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   x_spec = gene_spec(g2[1:10], colMeans, "Mean"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   y_spec = gene_spec(g2[11:20], colMedians, "Median"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   smooth_method = "loess"

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
draw_scatterplot <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
                             assay_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
                             x_spec,

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
                             y_spec,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
                             color_var = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
                             facet_var = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
                             smooth_method = c("lm", "loess", "none")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_class(object, "AnyHermesData")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_class(x_spec, "GeneSpec")

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_class(y_spec, "GeneSpec")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_true(x_spec$returns_vector())

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_true(y_spec$returns_vector())

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(color_var, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(facet_var, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
  smooth_method <- match.arg(smooth_method)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
  assay_matrix <- assay(object, assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
  col_data <- colData(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
    x = x_spec$extract(assay_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
    y = y_spec$extract(assay_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(facet_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_names(names(col_data), must.include = facet_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
    df$facet <- col_data[[facet_var]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(color_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
    assert_names(names(col_data), must.include = color_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
    df$color <- col_data[[color_var]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
  p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = .data$x, y = .data$y)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    labs(x = x_spec$get_label(), y = y_spec$get_label())

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(color_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    p <- p + geom_point(aes(color = .data$color)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
      labs(color = color_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
    p <- p + geom_point()

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (smooth_method != "none") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
    p <- p + geom_smooth(method = smooth_method, formula = y ~ x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(facet_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    p <- p + facet_wrap(~facet)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    1x
                    
                      
  p

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Barplot for Gene Expression Percentiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This produces a barplot of the dichotomized gene expression counts into two or three

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' categories based on custom defined percentiles.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assay_name (`string`)\cr selects assay from input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x_spec (`GeneSpec`)\cr gene specification for the x-axis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param facet_var (`string` or `NULL`)\cr optional faceting variable, taken

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   from input sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param fill_var (`string` or `NULL`)\cr optional fill variable, taken

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   from input sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param percentiles (`vector`)\cr lower and upper percentiles to dichotomize

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   the gene counts into two or three categories.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ggplot` barplot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' g <- genes(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_barplot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   x_spec = gene_spec(g[1]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   facet_var = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   fill_var = "AGE18"

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_barplot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   x_spec = gene_spec(g[1:3], colMedians, "Median"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   facet_var = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   fill_var = "AGE18"

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_barplot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   x_spec = gene_spec(g[1:3], colMeans, "Mean"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   facet_var = "SEX",

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   fill_var = "AGE18",

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   percentiles = c(0.1, 0.9)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
draw_barplot <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
                         assay_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
                         x_spec,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
                         facet_var = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
                         fill_var = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
                         percentiles = c(1 / 3, 2 / 3)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_class(object, "AnyHermesData")

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_class(x_spec, "GeneSpec")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_true(x_spec$returns_vector())

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(facet_var, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(fill_var, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    percentiles,

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
    lower = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
    upper = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
    any.missing = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
    len = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
    unique = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
    sorted = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    1x
                    
                      
  assay_matrix <- assay(object, assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
  x_cont <- x_spec$extract(assay_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    1x
                    
                      
  col_data <- colData(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(x = cut_quantile(x_cont, percentiles))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(facet_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
    assert_names(names(col_data), must.include = facet_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
    df$facet <- col_data[[facet_var]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(fill_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    assert_names(names(col_data), must.include = fill_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    df$fill <- col_data[[fill_var]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
  p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = .data$x)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
    geom_bar() +

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
    labs(x = x_spec$get_label())

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(facet_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
    p <- p + facet_wrap(~facet)

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(fill_var)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    1x
                    
                      
    p <- p + aes(fill = .data$fill) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    1x
                    
                      
      labs(fill = fill_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    1x
                    
                      
  p

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# pipe ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Pipe operator

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' See \code{magrittr::\link[magrittr:pipe]{\%>\%}} for details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The result of the corresponding function call.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @name %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pipe

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom magrittr %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @usage lhs \%>\% rhs

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   summary()

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' Conversion to Factors with Explicit Missing Level in a `data.frame`

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function converts all character and logical variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' to factor variables in a `data.frame`. It also sets an explicit missing data level

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' for all factor variables that have at least one `NA`. Empty strings are handled

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' as `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`data.frame`)\cr input data with at least one column.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param na_level (`string`)\cr explicit missing level to be used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The modified data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' dat <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   a = c(NA, 2),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   b = c("A", NA),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   c = c("C", "D"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   d = factor(c(NA, "X")),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   e = factor(c("Y", "Z"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' h_df_factors_with_explicit_na(dat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
h_df_factors_with_explicit_na <- function(data, na_level = "<Missing>") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    16x
                    
                      
  assert_data_frame(data, min.cols = 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_string(na_level, min.chars = 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  # Conversion of all logical or character variables to factor.

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    15x
                    
                      
  var_is_char_or_logical <- vapply(data, is.logical, logical(1)) |

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    15x
                    
                      
    vapply(data, is.character, logical(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    15x
                    
                      
  data[, var_is_char_or_logical] <- lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    15x
                    
                      
    data[, var_is_char_or_logical, drop = FALSE],

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    15x
                    
                      
    factor

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  # Convert empty strings to `NA` for all factors.

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    15x
                    
                      
  var_is_factor <- vapply(data, is.factor, logical(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    15x
                    
                      
  data[, var_is_factor] <- lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    15x
                    
                      
    data[, var_is_factor, drop = FALSE],

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    15x
                    
                      
    forcats::fct_recode,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    15x
                    
                      
    NULL = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  # Add explicit missing level to all factors that have any `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    15x
                    
                      
  var_is_factor_with_na <- var_is_factor & vapply(data, anyNA, logical(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    15x
                    
                      
  data[, var_is_factor_with_na] <- lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    15x
                    
                      
    data[, var_is_factor_with_na, drop = FALSE],

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    15x
                    
                      
    forcats::fct_na_value_to_level,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    15x
                    
                      
    level = na_level

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    15x
                    
                      
  data

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' Conversion of Eligible Columns to Factor Variables in a `DataFrame`

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' This utility function converts all eligible character and logical variables in a

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' [`S4Vectors::DataFrame`] to factor variables. All factor variables get amended

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' with an explicit missing level. This includes both `NA` and empty strings.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' @note All required `rowData` and `colData` variables cannot be converted

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'   to ensure proper downstream behavior. These are automatically omitted if found in `data`

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'   and therefore do not need to be specified in `omit_columns`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`DataFrame`)\cr input [`S4Vectors::DataFrame`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' @param omit_columns (`character` or `NULL`)\cr which columns should be omitted from

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'   the possible conversion to factor and explicit missing level application.

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' @param na_level (`string`)\cr explicit missing level to be used for factor variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The modified data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' dat <- colData(summarized_experiment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' any(vapply(dat, is.character, logical(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' any(vapply(dat, is.logical, logical(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' dat_converted <- df_cols_to_factor(dat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' any(vapply(dat_converted, function(x) is.character(x) || is.logical(x), logical(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
df_cols_to_factor <- function(data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
                              omit_columns = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
                              na_level = "<Missing>") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    8x
                    
                      
  assert_that(is(data, "DataFrame"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    8x
                    
                      
  col_is_char_logical_factor <- vapply(data, is.character, logical(1)) |

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    8x
                    
                      
    vapply(data, is.logical, logical(1)) | vapply(data, is.factor, logical(1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    8x
                    
                      
  omit_columns <- union(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    8x
                    
                      
    omit_columns,

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    8x
                    
                      
    c(.row_data_cols, .col_data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    8x
                    
                      
  cols_to_convert <- setdiff(

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    8x
                    
                      
    names(which(col_is_char_logical_factor)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    8x
                    
                      
    omit_columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (length(cols_to_convert)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    8x
                    
                      
    data[, cols_to_convert] <- h_df_factors_with_explicit_na(

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    8x
                    
                      
      as.data.frame(data[, cols_to_convert]),

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    8x
                    
                      
      na_level = na_level

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    8x
                    
                      
  data

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' Checks Whether All Missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#' Internal function to check whether a whole vector is `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`vector`)\cr vector to check.

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Corresponding flag.

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
all_na <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    308x
                    
                      
  all(is.na(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' Make a Short List of a Character Vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function makes a short list string, e.g. "a, b, ..., z"

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' out of a character vector, e.g. `letters`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`character`)\cr input which should be listed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sep (`string`)\cr separator to use.

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#' @param thresh (`count`)\cr threshold to use, if the length of `x` is larger

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'   then the list will be shortened using the `...` ellipsis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#' @return String with the short list.

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' h_short_list(letters)

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' h_short_list(letters[1:3])

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' h_short_list(LETTERS[1:5], sep = ";", thresh = 5L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
h_short_list <- function(x, sep = ", ", thresh = 3L) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_character(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_string(sep, min.chars = 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    14x
                    
                      
  assert_int(thresh, lower = 3L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    13x
                    
                      
  n <- length(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    13x
                    
                      
  if (n > thresh) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    3x
                    
                      
    x <- c(x[c(1L, 2L)], "...", x[n])

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    13x
                    
                      
  paste(x, collapse = sep)

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' Parenthesize a Character Vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function adds parentheses around each element of a character

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#' vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`character`)\cr inputs which should be parenthesized.

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Character vector with parentheses, except when `x` is a blank string

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#'   in which case it is returned unaltered.

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
#' h_parens("bla")

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
#' h_parens("")

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
#' h_parens(c("bla", "bli"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
h_parens <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    21x
                    
                      
  assert_character(x, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    18x
                    
                      
  ifelse(x == "", x, paste0("(", x, ")"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
#' First Principal Component (PC1) Gene Signature

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function returns the first principal component from an assay

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' stored as a `matrix`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`matrix`)\cr containing numeric data with genes in rows and samples

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#'   in columns, no missing values are allowed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#' @param center (`flag`)\cr whether the variables should be zero centered.

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' @param scale (`flag`)\cr whether the variables should be scaled to have unit variance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A numeric vector containing the principal component values for each

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#'   column in `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay("counts")

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' colPrinComp1(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
colPrinComp1 <- function(x, # nolint

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
                         center = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
                         scale = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(x, any.missing = FALSE, mode = "numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
