                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(center)

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(scale)

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    1x
                    
                      
  gene_is_constant <- apply(x, MARGIN = 1L, FUN = S4Vectors::isConstant)

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    1x
                    
                      
  selected_data <- x[!gene_is_constant, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    1x
                    
                      
  pca_result <- stats::prcomp(t(selected_data), center = center, scale = scale)

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    1x
                    
                      
  pca_result$x[, 1L]

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
#' Mean Z-score Gene Signature

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function returns the Z-score from an assay stored as a `matrix`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams colPrinComp1

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A numeric vector containing the mean Z-score values for each

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
#'   column in `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay("counts")

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      
#' colMeanZscores(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
colMeanZscores <- function(x) { # nolint

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(x, any.missing = FALSE, mode = "numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    1x
                    
                      
  gene_is_constant <- apply(x, MARGIN = 1L, FUN = S4Vectors::isConstant)

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    1x
                    
                      
  z_vals <- x

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    1x
                    
                      
  z_vals[gene_is_constant, ] <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    1x
                    
                      
  z_vals[!gene_is_constant, ] <- apply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    1x
                    
                      
    z_vals[!gene_is_constant, , drop = FALSE],

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    1x
                    
                      
    MARGIN = 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    1x
                    
                      
    FUN = scale, # Note: scale() with centering and scaling is the z-score.

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    1x
                    
                      
    center = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    1x
                    
                      
    scale = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    1x
                    
                      
  colMeans(z_vals, na.rm = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    
                    
                      
#' Wrap in MAE

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function wraps `SummarizedExperiment` objects into an

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
#' a `MultiAssayExperiment` (MAE) object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`SummarizedExperiment`)\cr input to create the MAE object from.

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#' @param name (`string`)\cr experiment name to use in the MAE for `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The MAE object with the only experiment being `x` having the given

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
#' `name`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
#' mae <- wrap_in_mae(summarized_experiment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    
                    
                      
#' mae[["summarized_experiment"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
wrap_in_mae <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
                        name = deparse(substitute(x))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_class(x, "SummarizedExperiment")

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    3x
                    
                      
  assert_string(name, min.chars = 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    3x
                    
                      
  exp_list <- stats::setNames(list(x), name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    3x
                    
                      
  MultiAssayExperiment::MultiAssayExperiment(experiments = exp_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
#' Finding All Duplicates in Vector

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
#' The difference here to [duplicated()] is that also the first occurrence

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    
                    
                      
#' of a duplicate is flagged as `TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams base::duplicated

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Logical vector flagging all occurrences of duplicate values as `TRUE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    307
                    
                    
                      
#' h_all_duplicated(c("a", "a", "b"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    308
                    
                    
                      
#' duplicated(c("a", "a", "b"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    309
                    
                    
                      
h_all_duplicated <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    310
                    29x
                    
                      
  front <- duplicated(x, fromLast = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    311
                    29x
                    
                      
  back <- duplicated(x, fromLast = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    312
                    29x
                    
                      
  front | back

                    		
                  

                  

                    313
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    
                    
                      
#' Cutting a Numeric Vector into a Factor of Quantile Bins

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    
                    
                      
#' This function transforms a numeric vector into a factor corresponding to the quantile intervals.

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    
                    
                      
#' The intervals are left-open and right-closed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`numeric`)\cr the continuous variable values which should be cut into quantile bins. `NA` values are

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    
                    
                      
#'   not taken into account when computing quantiles and are attributed to the `NA` interval.

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      
#' @param percentiles (`proportions`)\cr the required percentiles for the quantile intervals

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    
                    
                      
#'   to be generated. Duplicated values are removed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    
                    
                      
#' @param digits (`integer`)\cr  the precision to use when formatting the percentages.

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The factor with a description of the available quantiles as levels.

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      
#' set.seed(452)

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- runif(10, -10, 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      
#' cut_quantile(x, c(0.33333333, 0.6666666), digits = 4)

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
#' x[1:4] <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
#' cut_quantile(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    
                    
                      
cut_quantile <- function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
                         percentiles = c(1 / 3, 2 / 3),

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      
                         digits = 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    9x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    9x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(percentiles, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    9x
                    
                      
  assert_integerish(digits, lower = 0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    9x
                    
                      
  percentiles_without_borders <- setdiff(percentiles, c(0, 1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    9x
                    
                      
  percentiles_without_borders <- round(percentiles_without_borders, digits = digits + 2L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    9x
                    
                      
  percentiles_without_borders <- unique(percentiles_without_borders)

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    9x
                    
                      
  percentile_with_borders <- c(0, sort(percentiles_without_borders), 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    9x
                    
                      
  if ((length(x) == 1) && (length(percentile_with_borders) == 2)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    1x
                    
                      
    return(factor("[0%,100%]"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    8x
                    
                      
  quant <- stats::quantile(

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    8x
                    
                      
    x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    8x
                    
                      
    probs = percentile_with_borders,

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    8x
                    
                      
    names = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    8x
                    
                      
    na.rm = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    360
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (any(duplicated(quant))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    361
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop("Duplicate quantiles produced, please use a coarser `percentiles` vector")

                    		
                  

                  

                    362
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    363
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    364
                    7x
                    
                      
  name_quant <- names(quant)

                    		
                  

                  

                    365
                    7x
                    
                      
  labs_quant <- paste0(name_quant[-length(name_quant)], ",", name_quant[-1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    366
                    7x
                    
                      
  labs_quant <- paste0("(", labs_quant, "]")

                    		
                  

                  

                    367
                    7x
                    
                      
  labs_quant[1] <- gsub("\\(", "[", labs_quant[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    368
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    369
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    370
                    7x
                    
                      
  cut(x, quant, labs_quant, include.lowest = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    371
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    372
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    373
                    
                    
                      
#' Concatenate and Print with Newline

                    		
                  

                  

                    374
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    375
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    376
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    377
                    
                    
                      
#' This function concatenates inputs like [cat()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    378
                    
                    
                      
#' and prints them with newline.

                    		
                  

                  

                    379
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    380
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso This is similar to [cli::cat_line()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    381
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    382
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... inputs to concatenate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    383
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    384
                    
                    
                      
#' @return None, only used for the side effect of producing the concatenated output in the R console.

                    		
                  

                  

                    385
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    386
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    387
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    388
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    389
                    
                    
                      
#' cat_with_newline("hello", "world")

                    		
                  

                  

                    390
                    
                    
                      
cat_with_newline <- function(...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    391
                    10x
                    
                      
  cat(...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    392
                    10x
                    
                      
  cat("\n", append = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    393
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Heatmap for Gene Expression Counts

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This produces a heatmap of the chosen assay and groups by various sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assay_name (`string`)\cr selects assay from input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param color_extremes (`numeric`)\cr min and max percentiles to inform the color scheme

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'   of the heatmap as blue and red respectively.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param col_data_annotation (`character` or `NULL`)\cr optional grouping variable(s), taken

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   from input sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... additional arguments to pass to [ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The `ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap` heatmap

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize(methods = "voom") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter(what = "genes")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_heatmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   object = result[1:10, ],

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   col_data_annotation = "COUNTRY"

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' draw_heatmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   object = result[1:10, ],

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   color_extremes = c(0.001, 0.999),

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   col_data_annotation = "AGEGRP"

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
draw_heatmap <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
                         assay_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
                         color_extremes = c(0.01, 0.99),

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
                         col_data_annotation = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
                         ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_class(object, "AnyHermesData")

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
    color_extremes,

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
    lower = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    1x
                    
                      
    upper = 1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1x
                    
                      
    any.missing = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    1x
                    
                      
    len = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1x
                    
                      
    unique = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
    sorted = TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_string(col_data_annotation, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
  selected_assay <- assay(object, assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
  color_probs <- c(color_extremes[1L], 0.5, color_extremes[2L])

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
  color_quantiles <- stats::quantile(x = selected_assay, probs = color_probs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
  colors <- circlize::colorRamp2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
    color_quantiles,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    c("blue", "white", "red")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(col_data_annotation)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    assert_character(col_data_annotation, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
    cd <- colData(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
    assert_names(names(cd), must.include = col_data_annotation)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
    df <- cd[col_data_annotation]

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
    sample_annotation <- ComplexHeatmap::HeatmapAnnotation(df = df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
    sample_order <- order(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
    sample_annotation <- sample_order <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
  ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    1x
                    
                      
    selected_assay,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1x
                    
                      
    name = assay_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
    col = colors,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
    top_annotation = sample_annotation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
    column_order = sample_order,

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Additional Assertions for `assert_that`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' We provide additional assertion functions which can be used together with

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' [assertthat::assert_that()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x an object to check.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @name assertions

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @import assertthat

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
# is_class ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn assertions checks the class.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @param class2 (`character` or class definition)\cr the class to which `x` could belong.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' # Assert a general class.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' a <- 5

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' is_class(a, "character")

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
is_class <- function(x, class2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    390x
                    
                      
  is(x, class2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
on_failure(is_class) <- function(call, env) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  obj_name <- deparse(call$x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  class <- eval(call$class2, env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  paste(obj_name, "is not of class", class)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
# is_hermes_data ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn assertions checks whether `x` is an [`AnyHermesData`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' # Assert a `AnyHermesData` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' is_hermes_data(hermes_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' is_hermes_data(42)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
is_hermes_data <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    303x
                    
                      
  is_class(x, "AnyHermesData")

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
on_failure(is_hermes_data) <- function(call, env) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  obj_name <- deparse(call$x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  paste(obj_name, "is not a HermesData or RangedHermesData object")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
}

# is_counts_vector ----

#' @describeIn assertions checks for a vector of counts (positive integers).

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' # Assert a counts vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' a <- 5L

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' is_counts_vector(a)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
is_counts_vector <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    19x
                    
                      
  is.integer(x) && all(x > 0) && noNA(x) && not_empty(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
on_failure(is_counts_vector) <- function(call, env) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65

                    66

# is_list_with ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn assertions checks for a list containing elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @param elements (`character`)\cr names of elements which should be in the list `x`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' # Assert a list containing certain elements.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' b <- list(a = 5, b = 3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' is_list_with(b, c("a", "c"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' is_list_with(b, c("a", "b"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
is_list_with <- function(x, elements) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    115x
                    
                      
  assert_character(elements, any.missing = FALSE, min.len = 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    115x
                    
                      
  test_list(x, names = "unique") &&

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    115x
                    
                      
    all(elements %in% names(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
on_failure(is_list_with) <- function(call, env) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  x_name <- deparse(call$x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  elements <- eval(call$elements, env)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    x_name, "is not a fully and uniquely named list containing all elements",

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    paste(elements, collapse = ", ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
# one_provided ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn assertions checks that exactly one of the two inputs `one`, `two` is not `NULL`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' @param one first input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @param two second input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' # Assert that exactly one of two arguments is provided.

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' a <- 10

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' b <- 10

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' one_provided(a, b)

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' one_provided(a, NULL)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
one_provided <- function(one, two) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    22x
                    
                      
  (is.null(one) && !is.null(two)) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    22x
                    
                      
    (is.null(two) && !is.null(one))

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
on_failure(one_provided) <- function(call, env) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  one_name <- deparse(call$one)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
  two_name <- deparse(call$two)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  paste(

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
    "only one of", one_name, "and", two_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
    "must be specified, the other needs to be set to NULL"

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
# is_constant ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn assertions checks whether the vector `x` is constant (only supports `numeric`, `factor`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'   `character`, `logical`). `NA`s are removed first.

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' # Assert a constant vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#' is_constant(c(1, 2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' is_constant(c(NA, 1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' is_constant(c("a", "a"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#' is_constant(factor(c("a", "a")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
is_constant <- function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    464x
                    
                      
  assert_that(is.atomic(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    464x
                    
                      
  x <- x[!is.na(x)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    464x
                    
                      
  if (is.numeric(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    143x
                    
                      
    S4Vectors::isConstant(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    321x
                    
                      
  } else if (is.factor(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    79x
                    
                      
    S4Vectors::isConstant(as.integer(x))

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    242x
                    
                      
  } else if (is.character(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    225x
                    
                      
    identical(length(unique(x)), 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    17x
                    
                      
  } else if (is.logical(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    17x
                    
                      
    all(x) || all(!x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("not supported type")

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include HermesData-validate.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
# HermesData-class ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `HermesData` and `RangedHermesData`

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' The [`HermesData`] class is an extension of [`SummarizedExperiment::SummarizedExperiment`]

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' with additional validation criteria.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @details The additional criteria are:

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' - The first assay must be `counts` containing non-missing, integer, non-negative values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   Note that [rename()] can be used to edit the assay name to `counts` if needed.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' - The following columns must be in `rowData`:

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `symbol` (also often called `HGNC` or similar, example: `"INMT"`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `desc` (the gene name, example: `"indolethylamine N-methyltransferase"`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `chromosome` (the chromosome as string, example: `"7"`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `size` (the size of the gene in base pairs, e.g `5468`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `low_expression_flag` (can be populated with [add_quality_flags()])

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' - The following columns must be in `colData`:

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `low_depth_flag` (can be populated with [add_quality_flags()])

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   - `tech_failure_flag` (can be populated with [add_quality_flags()])

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' - The object must have unique row and column names. The row names are the gene names

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   and the column names are the sample names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' Analogously, [`RangedHermesData`] is an extension of

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' [`SummarizedExperiment::RangedSummarizedExperiment`] and has the same

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' additional validation requirements. Methods can be defined for both classes at the

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' same time with the [`AnyHermesData`] signature.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' A [`Biobase::ExpressionSet`] object can be imported by using the

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' [SummarizedExperiment::makeSummarizedExperimentFromExpressionSet()] function to

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' first convert it to a [`SummarizedExperiment::SummarizedExperiment`] object before

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' converting it again into a [`HermesData`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' @note

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
