#' Internal Helper Functions for Validation of `AnyHermesData` Objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' These functions are used internally only and therefore not exported. They work on

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' [`SummarizedExperiment::SummarizedExperiment`] objects, and [`AnyHermesData`] objects are

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' defined by successfully passing these validation checks.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @name validate

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A character vector with the validation failure messages, or `NULL` in

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'   case validation passes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
# Constants which are used in multiple places.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
.row_data_cols <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
  "symbol",

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
  "desc",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
  "chromosome",

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  "size",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "low_expression_flag"

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
.col_data_cols <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  "low_depth_flag",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  "tech_failure_flag"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn validate validates that the first assay is `counts` containing

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   non-missing, integer, non-negative values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`SummarizedExperiment`)\cr object to validate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
validate_counts <- function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    99x
                    
                      
  nams <- assayNames(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    99x
                    
                      
  if (!("counts" %in% nams)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    3x
                    
                      
    return("no 'counts' assay found, consider using rename() to change assay name")

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    96x
                    
                      
  if (nams[1] != "counts") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    1x
                    
                      
    return("'counts' must be the first assay")

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    95x
                    
                      
  msg <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    95x
                    
                      
  counts <- assay(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    95x
                    
                      
  if (!is.integer(counts)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "'counts' must be numeric in integer mode")

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    95x
                    
                      
  if (any(is.na(counts))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    1x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "missing values in 'counts'")

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    95x
                    
                      
  if (any(counts < 0, na.rm = TRUE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    1x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "negative values in 'counts'")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    95x
                    
                      
  msg

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn validate validates that required column names are contained in

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'   actual column names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @param required (`character`)\cr required column names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @param actual (`actual`)\cr actual column names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
validate_cols <- function(required, actual) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    207x
                    
                      
  if (!all(required %in% actual)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    12x
                    
                      
    missing <- setdiff(required, actual)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    12x
                    
                      
    paste("required columns", paste(missing, collapse = ", "), "not present")

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    195x
                    
                      
    NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn validate validates that the object contains `rowData` with

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   required columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
validate_row_data <- function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    99x
                    
                      
  required_cols <- .row_data_cols

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    99x
                    
                      
  actual_cols <- colnames(rowData(object))

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    99x
                    
                      
  validate_cols(required_cols, actual_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn validate validates that the object contains `colData` with

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'   required columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
validate_col_data <- function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    99x
                    
                      
  required_cols <- .col_data_cols

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    99x
                    
                      
  actual_cols <- colnames(colData(object))

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    99x
                    
                      
  validate_cols(required_cols, actual_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn validate validates that the object contains row and column names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
validate_names <- function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    101x
                    
                      
  msg <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    101x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(rownames(object))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    4x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "'object' must have rownames")

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    101x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(colnames(object))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    4x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "'object' must have colnames")

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    101x
                    
                      
  if (any(duplicated(rownames(object)))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    2x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "'object' must have unique rownames")

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    101x
                    
                      
  if (any(duplicated(colnames(object)))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    2x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "'object' must have unique colnames")

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    101x
                    
                      
  msg

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn validate validates that the object prefix is a string

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'   and only contains alphabetic characters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
validate_prefix <- function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    98x
                    
                      
  prefix <- object@prefix

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    98x
                    
                      
  msg <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    98x
                    
                      
  if (!is.string(prefix)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    3x
                    
                      
    msg <- c(msg, "'prefix' must be string")

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    95x
                    
                      
    if (grepl("[^[:alpha:]]", prefix)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    1x
                    
                      
      msg <- c(msg, "'prefix' can only consist of alphabetic characters")

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    95x
                    
                      
    gene_ids <- rownames(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    95x
                    
                      
    if (!all(grepl(paste0("^", prefix), gene_ids))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    1x
                    
                      
      msg <- c(msg, "'prefix' does not match at least one gene ID")

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    98x
                    
                      
  msg

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Principal Components Analysis Calculation

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' The `calc_pca()` function performs principal components analysis of the gene count

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' vectors across all samples.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' A corresponding `autoplot()` method then can visualize the results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' - PCA should be performed after filtering out low quality genes and samples, as well as

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalization of counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' - In addition, genes with constant counts across all samples are excluded from

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   the analysis internally in `calc_pca()`. Centering and scaling is also applied internally.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' - Plots can be obtained with the [ggplot2::autoplot()] function

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   with the corresponding method from the `ggfortify` package to plot the

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   results of a principal components analysis saved in a [`HermesDataPca`]

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   object. See [ggfortify::autoplot.prcomp()] for details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`) \cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assay_name (`string`) \cr name of the assay to use.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_top (`count` or `NULL`)\cr filter criteria based on number of genes with maximum variance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A [HermesDataPca] object which is an extension of the [stats::prcomp] class.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso Afterwards correlations between principal components

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   and sample variables can be calculated, see [`pca_cor_samplevar`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- calc_pca(object, assay_name = "tpm")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' summary(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' result1 <- calc_pca(object, assay_name = "tpm", n_top = 500)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' summary(result1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' # Plot the results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result, x = 2, y = 3)

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result, variance_percentage = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result, label = TRUE, label.repel = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
calc_pca <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
                     assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
                     n_top = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    14x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    14x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    14x
                    
                      
    is.string(assay_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    14x
                    
                      
    is.numeric(n_top) || is.null(n_top)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    12x
                    
                      
  x_samples_filtered <- if (is.null(n_top)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    10x
                    
                      
    object

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2x
                    
                      
    top_var <- top_genes(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    2x
                    
                      
      object = object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    2x
                    
                      
      assay_name = assay_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2x
                    
                      
      summary_fun = matrixStats::rowVars,

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2x
                    
                      
      n_top = n_top

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2x
                    
                      
    is_top_gene <- rownames(object) %in% as.character(top_var$name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2x
                    
                      
    object[is_top_gene, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    12x
                    
                      
  x_samples <- assay(x_samples_filtered, assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    11x
                    
                      
  x_genes <- t(x_samples)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    11x
                    
                      
  gene_is_constant <- apply(x_genes, MARGIN = 2L, FUN = S4Vectors::isConstant)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    11x
                    
                      
  x_genes_remaining <- x_genes[, !gene_is_constant]

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    11x
                    
                      
  pca <- stats::prcomp(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    11x
                    
                      
    x = x_genes_remaining,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    11x
                    
                      
    center = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    11x
                    
                      
    scale = TRUE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    11x
                    
                      
    tol = sqrt(.Machine$double.eps)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    11x
                    
                      
  .HermesDataPca(pca)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
setOldClass("prcomp")

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
# HermesDataPca ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname calc_pca

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases HermesDataPca

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @exportClass HermesDataPca

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
.HermesDataPca <- setClass( # nolint

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  Class = "HermesDataPca",

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "prcomp"

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# filter-data.frame ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname filter

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
  f = "filter",

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
  signature = signature(object = "data.frame"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
    # We just forward to the `dplyr` generic function, so that the user

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
    # can still filter data frames.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::filter(object, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
# filter-ts ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname filter

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  f = "filter",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  signature = signature(object = "ts"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    # We just forward to the `dplyr` generic function, which in this case

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    # will throw a meaningful error and point to `stats::filter`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    !
                    
                      
    dplyr::filter(object, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
# rename-data.frame ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname rename

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  f = "rename",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  signature = signature(x = "data.frame"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    # We just forward to the `dplyr` generic function, so that the user

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    # can still rename data frames.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    1x
                    
                      
    dplyr::rename(x, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Derivation of Top Genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' `top_genes()` creates a [`HermesDataTopGenes`] object, which extends [`data.frame`]. It

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' contains two columns:

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' - `expression`: containing the statistic values calculated by `summary_fun` across columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' - `name`: the gene names.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' The corresponding `autoplot()` method then visualizes the result as a barplot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' - The data frame is sorted in descending order of `expression` and only the top

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' entries according to the selection criteria are included.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' - Note that exactly one of the arguments `n_top` and `min_threshold` must be

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' provided.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermedData`)\cr input.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assay_name (`string`)\cr name of the assay to use for the sorting of genes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @param summary_fun (`function`)\cr summary statistics function to apply across the samples in

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   the assay resulting in a numeric vector with one value per gene.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_top (`count` or `NULL`)\cr selection criteria based on number of entries.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param min_threshold (`number` or `NULL` )\cr selection criteria based on a minimum

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   summary statistics threshold.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A [HermesDataTopGenes] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' # Default uses average of raw counts across samples to rank genes.

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' top_genes(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' # Instead of showing top 10 genes, can also set a minimum threshold on average counts.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' top_genes(object, n_top = NULL, min_threshold = 50000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can also use the maximum of raw counts across samples, by specifying a different

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' # summary statistics function.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- top_genes(object, summary_fun = rowMax)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
top_genes <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
                      assay_name = "counts",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
                      summary_fun = rowMeans,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
                      n_top = if (is.null(min_threshold)) 10L else NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
                      min_threshold = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    21x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    21x
                    
                      
    is_hermes_data(object),

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    21x
                    
                      
    is.function(summary_fun),

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    21x
                    
                      
    is.string(assay_name),

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    21x
                    
                      
    one_provided(n_top, min_threshold)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    16x
                    
                      
  x <- assay(object, assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    16x
                    
                      
  stat_values <- summary_fun(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    16x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    16x
                    
                      
    is.numeric(stat_values),

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    16x
                    
                      
    identical(length(stat_values), nrow(object)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    16x
                    
                      
    is.vector(stat_values)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    14x
                    
                      
  df <- data.frame(expression = stat_values)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    14x
                    
                      
  row_order <- order(df$expression, decreasing = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    14x
                    
                      
  df <- df[row_order, , drop = FALSE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    14x
                    
                      
  row_names <- rownames(object)[row_order]

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    14x
                    
                      
  df$name <- factor(

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    14x
                    
                      
    row_names,

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    14x
                    
                      
    levels = row_names

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    14x
                    
                      
  keep_row <- if (!is.null(min_threshold)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    4x
                    
                      
    assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    4x
                    
                      
      is.number(min_threshold),

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    4x
                    
                      
      min_threshold > 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    4x
                    
                      
      is.finite(min_threshold)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1x
                    
                      
    df$expression >= min_threshold

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    10x
                    
                      
    assert_that(is.count(n_top))

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    9x
                    
                      
    seq_len(n_top)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    10x
                    
                      
  df <- df[keep_row, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    10x
                    
                      
  .HermesDataTopGenes(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    10x
                    
                      
    df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    10x
                    
                      
    summary_fun_name = deparse(substitute(summary_fun)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    10x
                    
                      
    assay_name = assay_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
# HermesDataTopGenes ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname top_genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases HermesDataTopGenes

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @exportClass HermesDataTopGenes

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
.HermesDataTopGenes <- setClass( # nolint

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  Class = "HermesDataTopGenes",

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
    summary_fun_name = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    assay_name = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
# autoplot-HermesDataTopGenes ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn top_genes Creates a bar plot from a [HermesDataTopGenes] object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'   where the y axis shows the expression statistics for each of the top genes

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'   on the x-axis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x_lab (`string`)\cr x-axis label.

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @param y_lab (`string`)\cr y-axis label.

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @param title (`string`)\cr plot title.

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' # Finally we can produce barplots based on the results.

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result, title = "My top genes")

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result, y_lab = "Counts", title = "My top genes")

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  f = "autoplot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c(object = "HermesDataTopGenes"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
                        x_lab = "HGNC gene names",

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
                        y_lab = paste0(object@summary_fun_name, "(", object@assay_name, ")"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
                        title = "Top most expressed genes") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    2x
                    
                      
    assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    2x
                    
                      
      is.string(x_lab),

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    2x
                    
                      
      is.string(y_lab),

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    2x
                    
                      
      is.string(title)

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    2x
                    
                      
    df <- data.frame(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    2x
                    
                      
    ggplot(df) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    2x
                    
                      
      geom_col(aes(y = .data$expression, x = .data$name)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    2x
                    
                      
      scale_x_discrete(name = x_lab) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    2x
                    
                      
      scale_y_continuous(name = paste(y_lab, sep = "")) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    2x
                    
                      
      theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    2x
                    
                      
      ggtitle(paste(title, sep = "")) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    2x
                    
                      
      theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Additional Assertions for `checkmate`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' We provide additional assertion functions which can be used together with

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' the `checkmate` functions. These are described in individual help pages

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' linked below.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Depending on the function prefix.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' - `assert_` functions return the object invisibly if successful, and otherwise

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'   throw an error message.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' - `check_` functions return `TRUE` if successful, otherwise a string with the

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   error message.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' - `test_` functions just return `TRUE` or `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso [assert_proportion()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @name assertions

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @import checkmate

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
# assert_proportion ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' Check for proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' Check whether `x` is a (single) proportion.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams assertion_arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `TRUE` if successful, otherwise a string with the error message.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso [`assertions`] for more details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' check_proportion(0.25)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
check_proportion <- function(x, null.ok = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    63x
                    
                      
  ok <- test_number(x, lower = 0, upper = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    63x
