  if (!ok) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    13x
                    
                      
    return("Must be a 'proportion': number between 0 and 1")

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    50x
                    
                      
  return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname check_proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams assertion_arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
assert_proportion <- makeAssertionFunction(check_proportion)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname check_proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
test_proportion <- makeTestFunction(check_proportion)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname check_proportion

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' @inheritParams assertion_arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
expect_proportion <- makeExpectationFunction(check_proportion)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' @include pca.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @include HermesData-methods.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculation of R2 between Sample Variable and Principal Components

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' This helper function calculates R2 values between one sample variable from [`AnyHermesData`]

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' and all Principal Components (PCs) separately (one linear model is fit for each PC).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @details Note that in case there are estimation problems for any of the PCs, then `NA` will

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' be returned for those.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param pca (`matrix`)\cr principal components matrix generated by [calc_pca()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x (`vector`)\cr values of one sample variable from a [`AnyHermesData`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A vector with R2 values for each principal component.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' # Obtain the principal components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' pca <- calc_pca(object)$x

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' # Obtain the sample variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- colData(object)$AGE18

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' # Correlate them.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' r2 <- h_pca_var_rsquared(pca, x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
h_pca_var_rsquared <- function(pca, x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    165x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    165x
                    
                      
    is.matrix(pca),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    165x
                    
                      
    is.numeric(x) || is.factor(x) || is.character(x) || is.logical(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    165x
                    
                      
    identical(length(x), nrow(pca)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    165x
                    
                      
    all(abs(colMeans(pca)) < 1e-10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    162x
                    
                      
  use_sample <- !is.na(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    162x
                    
                      
  x <- x[use_sample]

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    162x
                    
                      
  if (is_constant(x)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    1x
                    
                      
    warning("sample variable is constant and R2 values cannot be calculated")

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    162x
                    
                      
  pca <- pca[use_sample, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    162x
                    
                      
  design <- stats::model.matrix(~x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  # Transpose such that PCs are in rows, and samples in columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    162x
                    
                      
  y0 <- t(pca)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    162x
                    
                      
  utils::capture.output(fit <- limma::lmFit(y0, design = design))

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    162x
                    
                      
  had_problems <- apply(fit$coefficients, 1L, function(row) any(is.na(row)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    162x
                    
                      
  sst <- rowSums(y0^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    162x
                    
                      
  ssr <- sst - fit$df.residual * fit$sigma^2

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    162x
                    
                      
  result <- ssr / sst

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    162x
                    
                      
  result[had_problems] <- NA

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    162x
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculation of R2 Matrix between Sample Variables and Principal Components

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' This function processes sample variables from [`AnyHermesData`] and the

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponding principal components matrix, and then generates the matrix of R2 values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   - Note that only the `df` columns which are `numeric`, `character`, `factor` or

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'     `logical` are included in the resulting matrix, because other variable types are not

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'     supported.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'   - In addition, `df` columns which are constant, all `NA`, or `character` or `factor`

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'     columns with too many levels are also dropped before the analysis.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @param pca (`matrix`)\cr comprises principal components generated by [calc_pca()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @param df (`data.frame`)\cr from the [SummarizedExperiment::colData()] of a

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'   [`AnyHermesData`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A matrix with R2 values for all combinations of sample variables and principal

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'   components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso [h_pca_var_rsquared()] which is used internally to calculate the R2 for one

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#'   sample variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' # Obtain the principal components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' pca <- calc_pca(object)$x

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' # Obtain the `colData` as a `data.frame`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' df <- as.data.frame(colData(object))

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' # Correlate them.

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' r2_all <- h_pca_df_r2_matrix(pca, df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' str(r2_all)

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can see that only about half of the columns from `df` were

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' # used for the correlations.

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' ncol(r2_all)

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' ncol(df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
h_pca_df_r2_matrix <- function(pca, df) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    5x
                    
                      
    is.matrix(pca),

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    5x
                    
                      
    is.data.frame(df),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    5x
                    
                      
    identical(nrow(pca), nrow(df))

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  # Sequentially filter down the columns in `df`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  # Sample variable must be numeric, character, factor or logical.

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    4x
                    
                      
  is_accepted_type <- vapply(df, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    296x
                    
                      
    is.numeric(x) || is.character(x) || is.factor(x) || is.logical(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    4x
                    
                      
  }, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    4x
                    
                      
  df <- df[, is_accepted_type]

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
  # Sample variable cannot be completely `NA`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    4x
                    
                      
  is_all_na <- vapply(df, all_na, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    4x
                    
                      
  df <- df[, !is_all_na]

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
  # Sample variable cannot have a constant value.

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    4x
                    
                      
  is_all_constant <- vapply(df, is_constant, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    4x
                    
                      
  df <- df[, !is_all_constant]

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
  # Filter character or factor sample variable that has too many (more than half the

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
  # number of samples) unique values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    4x
                    
                      
  too_many_levels <- vapply(df, function(x) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    228x
                    
                      
    (is.character(x) || is.factor(x)) && (length(unique(x)) > nrow(df) / 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    4x
                    
                      
  }, TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    4x
                    
                      
  df <- df[, !too_many_levels]

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
  # On all remaining columns, run R2 analysis vs. all principal components.

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    4x
                    
                      
  vapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    4x
                    
                      
    X = df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    4x
                    
                      
    FUN = h_pca_var_rsquared,

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    4x
                    
                      
    pca = pca,

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    4x
                    
                      
    FUN.VALUE = rep(0.5, ncol(pca))

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
# correlate-HermesDataPca ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' Correlation of Principal Components with Sample Variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("stable")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#' This `correlate()` method analyses the correlations (in R2 values) between all sample variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#' in a [`AnyHermesData`] object and the principal components of the samples.

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#' A corresponding `autoplot()` method then can visualize the results in a heatmap.

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pca_cor_samplevar

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases pca_cor_samplevar

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`HermesDataPca`)\cr input. It can be generated using [calc_pca()] function

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'   on [`AnyHermesData`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input that was used originally for the PCA.

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A [`HermesDataPcaCor`] object with R2 values for all sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso [h_pca_df_r2_matrix()] which is used internally for the details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' object <- hermes_data %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_quality_flags() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#'   filter() %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#'   normalize()

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#' # Perform PCA and then correlate the prinicipal components with the sample variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' object_pca <- calc_pca(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- correlate(object_pca, object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
  f = "correlate",

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c(object = "HermesDataPca"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object, data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    4x
                    
                      
    pca <- object$x

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    4x
                    
                      
    assert_that(

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    4x
                    
                      
      is_hermes_data(data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    4x
                    
                      
      is(object, "HermesDataPca"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    4x
                    
                      
      identical(rownames(pca), colnames(data))

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    3x
                    
                      
    df <- as.data.frame(colData(data))

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    3x
                    
                      
    r2_matrix <- h_pca_df_r2_matrix(pca, df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    3x
                    
                      
    .HermesDataPcaCor(r2_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
# HermesDataPcaCor ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname pca_cor_samplevar

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases HermesDataPcaCor

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
#' @exportClass HermesDataPcaCor

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
.HermesDataPcaCor <- setClass( # nolint

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
  Class = "HermesDataPcaCor",

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "matrix"

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
# autoplot-HermesDataPcaCor ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
#' @describeIn pca_cor_samplevar This plot method uses the [ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap()] function

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
#'   to visualize a [`HermesDataPcaCor`] object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cor_colors (`function`)\cr color scale function for the correlation values in the heatmap,

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
#'   produced by [circlize::colorRamp2()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... other arguments to be passed to [ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
#' # Visualize the correlations in a heatmap.

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can also choose to not reorder the columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(result, cluster_columns = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    
                    
                      
#' # We can also choose break-points for color customization.

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    
                    
                      
#' autoplot(

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
#'   result,

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
#'   cor_colors = circlize::colorRamp2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
#'     c(-0.5, -0.25, 0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
#'     c("blue", "green", "purple", "yellow", "orange", "red", "brown")

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
  f = "autoplot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c(object = "HermesDataPcaCor"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      
                        cor_colors = circlize::colorRamp2(

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
                          c(-1, 0, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
                          c("blue", "white", "red")

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      
                        ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
                        ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    1x
                    
                      
    mat <- as(object, "matrix")

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    1x
                    
                      
    ComplexHeatmap::Heatmap(

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    1x
                    
                      
      matrix = t(mat),

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    1x
                    
                      
      col = cor_colors,

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    1x
                    
                      
      name = "R2",

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    
                    
                      
      ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Sample Variables with Selected Gene Information

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' This obtains the sample variables of a `HermesData` object together

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' with selected gene information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object (`AnyHermesData`)\cr input experiment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param assay_name (`string`)\cr which assay to use.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param genes (`GeneSpec`)\cr which genes or which gene signature should be extracted.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @return The combined data set, where the additional attribute `gene_cols` contains

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   the names of the columns obtained by extracting the `genes` information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @note The class of the returned data set will depend on the class of `colData`, so usually

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   will be [`S4Vectors::DFrame`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- col_data_with_genes(hermes_data, "counts", gene_spec("GeneID:1820"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' tail(names(result))

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' result$GeneID.1820

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
col_data_with_genes <- function(object,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
                                assay_name,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
                                genes) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_class(object, "AnyHermesData")

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_string(assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_class(genes, "GeneSpec")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    2x
                    
                      
  col_data <- colData(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    2x
                    
                      
  assay_matrix <- assay(object, assay_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    2x
                    
                      
  gene_data <- genes$extract_data_frame(assay_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    2x
                    
                      
  assert_true(identical(

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    2x
                    
                      
    rownames(col_data),

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    2x
                    
                      
    rownames(gene_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    2x
                    
                      
  structure(

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    2x
                    
                      
    cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    2x
                    
                      
      col_data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    2x
                    
                      
      gene_data

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    2x
                    
                      
    gene_cols = names(gene_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' Inner Joining a Genes with a CDISC Data Set

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @description `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' This is a useful function when trying to join genetic with CDISC data sets.

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @param gene_data (`data.frame` or `DataFrame`)\cr genetic data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cdisc_data (`data.frame`)\cr CDISC data (typically patient level data).

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @param patient_key (`string`)\cr patient identifier.

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @param additional_keys (`character`)\cr potential additional keys for the two data sets.

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A `data.frame` which contains columns from both data sets merged by the keys.

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @note Columns which are contained in both data sets but are not specified as keys are taken

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   from `gene_data` and not from `cdisc_data`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' gene_data <- col_data_with_genes(hermes_data, "counts", gene_spec("GeneID:1820"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' cdisc_data <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'   USUBJID = head(gene_data$USUBJID, 10),

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'   extra = 1:10

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' result <- inner_join_cdisc(gene_data, cdisc_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' result

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
inner_join_cdisc <- function(gene_data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
                             cdisc_data,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
                             patient_key = "USUBJID",

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
                             additional_keys = character()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_subset(class(gene_data), choices = c("data.frame", "DFrame", "DataFrame"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_data_frame(cdisc_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_string(patient_key, min.chars = 1L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_character(additional_keys, min.chars = 1L, any.missing = FALSE, unique = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    5x
                    
                      
  all_keys <- union(patient_key, additional_keys)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_names(names(gene_data), must.include = all_keys)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    5x
                    
                      
  assert_names(names(cdisc_data), must.include = all_keys)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  # Inner join by provided keys.

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    5x
                    
                      
  cols_to_take_from_gene_data <- setdiff(names(gene_data), all_keys)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    5x
                    
                      
  cols_from_cdisc_data <- setdiff(names(cdisc_data), cols_to_take_from_gene_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    5x
                    
                      
  cdisc_data <- cdisc_data[, cols_from_cdisc_data, drop = FALSE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    5x
                    
                      
  result <- merge(gene_data, cdisc_data, by = all_keys)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  # Check whether patients were lost from `gene_data`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    5x
                    
                      
  gene_patients <- unique(gene_data[[patient_key]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    5x
                    
                      
  result_patients <- unique(result[[patient_key]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    5x
                    
                      
  patients_not_in_cdisc <- setdiff(gene_patients, result_patients)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (length(patients_not_in_cdisc) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    1x
                    
                      
    warning(

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    1x
                    
                      
      "Patients ", toString(patients_not_in_cdisc),

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    1x
                    
                      
      " from gene data set were lost because they could not be joined to CDISC data set"

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    5x
                    
                      
  as.data.frame(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
}
